product_name: Honey Stinger Kids' Organic Waffle - Package of 6
long_description: No artificial colors and flavors, preservatives or high fructose corn syrup! The Honey Stinger Kids' Organic Waffle serves up 80 delicious calories to energize kids while they search for outdoor fun. Certified USDA organic. Package of 6 individually wrapped waffles. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
